content: गम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (गच्छति, जगाम, अगमत्, गमिष्यति, गंतुं, गत {%<ab>desid.</ab>%}; जिगमिषति, जिगांसते <ab>Atm.</ab>; {%<ab>freq.</ab>%} जंगम्यते; जंगमीति or जंगंति) {@--1@} To go, move in general; गच्छत्वार्या पुनर्दर्शनाय <ls>V. 5</ls>; गच्छति पुरः शरीरं धावति पश्चादसंस्तुतं चेतः <ls>Ś. 1. 34</ls>; क्वाधुना गम्यते ‘where art thou going’. {@--2@} To depart, go forth, go away, set forth or out; उत्क्षिप्यैनां ज्योतिरेकं जगाम <ls>Ś. 5. 30.</ls> {@--3@} To go to, reach, resort to, arrive at, approach; यदगम्योपि गम्यते <ls>Pt. 1. 7</ls>; एनो गच्छति कर्तारं <ls>Ms. 8. 19</ls> the sin goes to (recoils on) the doer; <ls n="Ms.">4. 199</ls>; so धरणिं मूर्ध्ना गम् &c. {@--4@} To pass, pass away, elapse (as time); दिनेषु गच्छत्सु <ls>R. 3. 8</ls> as days rolled on, in course of time; <ls>Me. 83</ls>; काव्यशास्त्रविनोदेन कालो गच्छति धीमतां <ls>H. 1. 1</ls>; गच्छता कालेन in the long run. {@--5@} To go to the state or condition of, become, undergo, suffer, partake of &c. (usually joined with nouns ending in ता, --त्व &c. or any noun in the <ab>acc.</ab>); गमिष्याम्युपहास्यतां <ls>R. 1. 3</ls>; पश्चादुमाख्यां सुमुखी जगाम <ls>Ku. 1. 26</ls> went by or received the name of Umā; so तृप्तिं गच्छति becomes satis fied; विषादं गतः became dejected; कोपं न गच्छति does not become angry; आनृण्यं गतः became released from debt; मनसा गम् to think of, remember; <ls>Ku. 2. 63</ls>; वृषेण गच्छतः riding a bull; <ls>Ku. 5. 80.</ls> {@--6@} To cohabit, have sexual intercourse with; गुरोः सुतां… यो गच्छति पुमान् <ls>Pt. 2. 107</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 80.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (गमयति-ते) {@--1@} To cause to go, lead or reduce to (as a state); गमितः गतिं <ls>Ku. 4. 24</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 38</ls>; <ls>Ki. 2. 7.</ls> {@--2@} To spend, pass (as time). {@--3@} To make clear, explain, expound. {@--4@} To signify, denote, convey an idea or sense of; द्वौ नञौ प्रकृतार्थं गमयतः ‘two negatives make one affirmative.’ {@--5@} To send to. {@--6@} To bring to a place (<ab>acc.</ab>). {@--7@} To impart, grant, bestow. {@--8@} To intend, mean.
